Reviews.Title: Sweet Phone
Reviews.Author: J. Saunders
Reviews.Content: Very sleek looking phone. Besides the fact that it looks great, it has an AWESOME camera/video option. Very very nice picture/video. The call quality is great, and it has a lot of cool features.Also...YOU DO NOT have to purchase a data plane for verison with this phone! Thats one of the main reasons I bought this smart phone instead of a newer one. Saves A LOT of money ($30+ a month compared to a newer smart phone).The only bad thing about this phone I found was its a little bit slow at responding to commands. But you get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone at a great price
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey S. Foster "inluvwithamazon"
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good phone at a great price, look no further! This phone made by Motorola stands up to the competition with unparalleled quality! Great camera & screen, QWERTY keyboard for easy texting, need I say more? The person that left the earlier review needs to rethink what they said about the broken screen... How do you "barely drop" anything? You either drop it or you don't... That's why they make sturdy cases, for those accidental drops that can and WILL break screens...Buy this phone, you won't be dissatisfied!

Reviews.Title: No keyboard light?!
Reviews.Author: jon

Reviews.Title: HMMM
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Not all that was expected from this phone. They reviews said differntly. But this phone isnt working as it was advertised. Yes I only paid $25.00 but Id have expected a little more.

Reviews.Title: trouble phone.
Reviews.Author: j
Reviews.Content: after having the phone for about 4-days the battery drains rapidly intermittently or it wont charge unless you remove the battery and reinserted back on, this is very frustrated becaused you just don't expect to have to do this everyday, I do not recommend this phone at all, stay away from it.

Reviews.Title: Motrola Verizon Q phone
Reviews.Author: GG
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted, works as advertized.  Really fast shipment, arrived in perfect condition.  I saved a bundle over what a new phone from Verizon would have cost!

Reviews.Title: Really Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: its a nice smart phone it does not have WiFi but you can buy a WiFi mini SD card for it witch will allow you to surf the web the thing i like about this phone is that it does not need a data plan when your using the *44.... for the activation can Verizon to help block the internet features or take it to a store this is a nice phone with many applications if you like music pictures and watching videos this is a good phone for you.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Rosa
Reviews.Content: this product is horrible. my friend barely dropped it from the bed to floor and the screen broke! the keys also stopped working and it turns off fast. do not purchase!

ProductInfo.Features:
Excellent QWERTY Keyboard.
Bluetooth Connectivity - Take your talking to the next level with a Bluetooth wireless headset.
Version 6 of Windows Mobile
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No Contract Required
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Q9m Verizon Cell Phone. No Contract
